metadata.description: Mypy error enumeration for LUKHAS AI Agent Army task assignment

completion_criteria.per_task: All mypy errors in assigned files must be resolved or have appropriate type: ignore comments
completion_criteria.overall: Total mypy errors reduced by 80% with no critical import/attribute errors remaining

notes: Tasks are ordered by priority (critical errors first)
Each task includes specific instructions for resolution
Use type: ignore comments sparingly and only when necessary
Test changes to ensure functionality is not broken
